title: Space Tech Company Firefly Goes Public This Week. It Just Upped Its Stock Price Range.
Jewish Heritage and the Search for Accountability
summary: Between the human tragedy unfolding in Gaza, the resurgence of anti-Semitism in the United States, and the cynical misuse of that trend to crack down on freedom of expression, one feels as though history has been thrown into reverse.
fullContent: Between the human tragedy unfolding in Gaza, the resurgence of anti-Semitism in the United States, and the cynical misuse of that trend to crack down on freedom of expression, one feels as though history has been thrown into reverse. In this context, we could do worse than to consider what our own ancestors would say.
